definitions.definition: A state in eastern India . Capital: Gangtok .
A former country in South Asia that existed from the 17th century until its annexation by India in 1975. Official name: Kingdom of Sikkim .

main_definition: A state in eastern India . Capital: Gangtok .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A former country in South Asia that existed from the 17th century until its annexation by India in 1975. Official name: Kingdom of Sikkim .
